saveEditedBlog(int) - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
The method saveEditedBlog(int id) is called upon saving the edited blog, after that the blogger has edited a certain blog of his choice; This method receives the id of the blog that is being edited;
saveEditedFaq(int) - Static method in class controllers.FAQController
Method that saves edited FAQ
saveEditedProduct(int) - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
Saves the new values of the attributes that are entered and overwrites over the ones that were entered before;
saveEditedUser(int) - Static method in class controllers.UserController

saveEditSubCategory(int) - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController

saveFile(int) - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
Method saveFile() i called if the blogger has choosen to upload a picture to the blog he has just added through the method addBlog() & createBlog(); And in the case if the blogger has choosen to skip this adding the picture our saveFile() method sets the picture of the just added blog to the default picture This method receives the id of the just created Blog;
saveFile(int) - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
Upload image for User profile, and show picture on user /profile.html.
saveFile() - Static method in class controllers.UserController
Upload image for User profile, and show picture on user /profile.html.
saveMessage(int) - Static method in class controllers.UserController
Method that binds values from sendMessage form and creates new message using create method in PrivateMessage model.
saveNoFile(int) - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
If the user does not want to upload a picture.
searchBlog(String) - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
Method searchBlog(String q) receives a String as a parameter and searches the list of all the blogs by that name and sends the list found to the blog.html page
searchFaq(String) - Static method in class controllers.FAQController
Method searchFaq(String q) receives the String q and by the same String search through all the FAQs

showBlog() - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
Method showBlog() renders the blog.html page with the following parameters, correct - The list of all te blogs from our database; listing in the order from the newly added to the old ones;
showCredits() - Static method in class controllers.CreditController
Main page for the BitPikCredits of the User; On which we give the amount of the BitPikcredits the User has; and give him the option to either use the Credits he has on certain products or an option to buy more Credits;
showOneBlog(int) - Static method in class controllers.BloggerController
Method showOneBlog(int id) receives the parameters integer id, finds the choosen blog to view by the id and renders the page oneBlog.html Rendering the page with the parameters > the list of all the blogs, current user and the choosen blog to view;
showProduct(int) - Static method in class controllers.ProductController
Method showProduct() renders the showProduct page with the product that has been clicked on;

showStats() - Static method in class controllers.StatsController
Method showStats() gets us the page statsproducts where we give the list of all products to the User who has published all of the products, it does not matter whether he is still selling them or has already sold them.

Method shows profile view of single user

StatsController - Class in controllers

subCategories - Variable in class models.MainCategory
 
subCategoriesView(int) - Static method in class controllers.CategoryController
Method subCategoriesView finds all entries in database which are members of given Sub Category and sends them to view to be showed; productsList - which are all the products which are not sold and not special (not distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; specialProductList - all the products that are not sold and are made special (are distinguished products) and are from the sub Category by the id received; mainCategoryList - the list of our categories;
